# 代码规范

# if语句的优雅写法

# 5条原则

  1. 多重判断时使用Array.includes
  2. 更少的嵌套，尽早return
  3. 使用默认参数和解构
  4. 倾向于遍历对象而不是switch
  5. 对 所有/部分 判断使用Array.every & Array.some

# 多重判断时使用Array.includes

Bad:
function test(item){
    if(item=='sunwukong' || item=='zhubajie'){
        console.log('in')
    }else{
        console.log('out')
    }
}
test('sunwukong')

Good:
function test(item){
    const westTeam = ['tansheng','sunwukong','zhubajie','shaheshang','bailongma']
    if(westTeam.includes(item)){
        console.log('in')
    }else{
        console.log('out')
    }
}
test('sunwukong')

注意：Array.indexOf & Array.includes的区别
Array.indexOf返回的是索引值，没有找到返回-1
Array.includes返回的是布尔值，没有找到返回的是false

# 更少的嵌套，尽早return

Bad:
function test(item){
    const westTeam = ['tansheng','sunwukong','zhubajie','shaheshang','bailongma']
    if(item){
        if(westTeam.includes(item)){
            console.log('in')
        }else{
            console.log('out')
        }
    }
}
test('sunwukong')

Good:
function test(item){
    const westTeam = ['tansheng','sunwukong','zhubajie','shaheshang','bailongma']
    if(!item) return
    if(westTeam.includes(item)){
        console.log('in')
    }else{
        console.log('out')
    }
}
test('sunwukong')

总结：尽早return不满足条件的情况，避免多层if嵌套

# 使用默认参数和解构

function test(name,age = 500){
    console.log('my nama is ' + name,'my age is ' + age)
}
test('sunwukong')
test('zhubajie',800)

function test({ name } = { }){
    console.log('my name is ' + (name || 'unknow'))
}
test('sunwukong')  // => unknow
test() // => unknow
test({name:'sunwukong',age:500}) // => sunwukong

# 倾向于遍历对象而不是switch

Bad:
const teamers = [
        {name:'tansheng',age:24},
        {name:'sunwukong',age:500},
        {name:'zhubajie',age:600},
        {name:'shashidi',age:700}
    ]
function test(name = 'tansheng'){
    switch(name){
        case 'sunwukong':
            return 500
        case 'zhubajie':
            return 600
        case 'shashidi':
            return 700
        default:
            return 24
    }
}
test('sunwukong')

Good:
const teamers = [
        {name:'tansheng',age:24},
        {name:'sunwukong',age:500},
        {name:'zhubajie',age:600},
        {name:'shashidi',age:700}
    ]
function test(name = 'tansheng'){
    for(let item of teamers){
        if(item.name==name){
            console.log(item['age'])
        }
    }
}
test('sunwukong')
test()

# 对 所有/部分 判断使用Array.every & Array.some

function test(name){
    const westTeam = ['tansheng','sunwukong','zhubajie','shaheshang','bailongma']
    const has = westTeam.some(item => item==name)
    const all = westTeam.every(item => item==name)
    console.log(has, all)
}
test('') // => false & false
test('sunwukong') // => true & false

# 空对象的判断

function test(){
    const obj = {}
    if(obj){
        console.log('我不是空对象')
    }else{
        console.log('我是空对象')
    }
    const keys = Object.keys(obj)
    console.log(keys) // => []
    const str = JSON.stringify(obj)
    console.log(str=='{}') // => true
}
test() // => 我不是空对象
